Reads data from the a variety of sources, interprets it according to {{tt|format}} and stores the results into given locations.

@1@ Reads the data from {{lc|stdin}}.
@2@ Reads the data from file stream {{tt|stream}}.
@3@ Reads the data from null-terminated wide string {{tt|buffer}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par | stream | input file stream to read from}}
{{par | buffer | pointer to a null-terminated wide string to read from}}
{{par | format | pointer to a null-terminated wide string specifying how to read the input}}
{{par | ... | receiving arguments.}}
{{par end}}


{{cpp/io/c/scanf format|wcs=true}}

===Return value===
Number of arguments successfully read, or {{lc|EOF}} if failure occurs before the first receiving argument was assigned.
